title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Currently, the Open/Close project options are sometimes available and sometimes not when both P1 and P2 are selected.
OB: Sometimes, when both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open/Close project options are available.
EB: Currently, the Open/Close project options are not consistently available when both P1 and P2 are selected. Either both options should be available or neither should be enabled.
